API_Description: Removes an annotation from the PDF document.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'deleteAnnot' suggests it is used to delete an annotation from the document.
Returns: A boolean indicating whether the annotation was successfully deleted.
Returns_Reason: Typically, a method that performs a delete operation returns a boolean to indicate success or failure.

nPage.description: The 0-based index of the page from which to delete the annotation.
nPage.description_reason: Deleting an annotation requires specifying the page it is located on, as annotations are page-specific.
nPage.type_reason: Page indices are usually represented as numbers.

cName.description: The name or ID of the annotation to be deleted.
cName.description_reason: Annotations are often identified by a unique name or ID, which is necessary to specify which annotation to delete.
cName.type_reason: Names or IDs are typically represented as strings.
